code: import{createSelector}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";/** Selector **/var groupSelector=function groupSelector(state){return state.group;};var selectListGroupSelector=createSelector(groupSelector,function(state){return state.groups;});var selectLoadingSelector=createSelector(groupSelector,function(state){return state.isLoading;});/** function */export var selectListGroups=function selectListGroups(state){return selectListGroupSelector(state);};export var selectLoading=function selectLoading(state){return selectLoadingSelector(state);};
